projects.name: Chatbot
projects.description: The chat bot app is a conversational AI-powered tool designed to enhance user experience by providing instant, personalized, and automated responses to user inquiries.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: The weather app retrieves real-time weather data from a weather API and displays the current temperature and 5-day forecast for a default city. Additional features allow users to cycle through various cities with a button click and offers a search bar to find weather information for any specified city.

projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.description: This project allows users to post happy thoughts, view the most recent posts, and like posts by clicking a button. It uses the useEffect hook to handle side effects such as fetching recent posts from an API and updating the time since each thought was posted in real time.

projects.name: Music Releases
projects.description: The music releases app features a structured component hierarchy, responsive layouts, hover effects, and external linking for albums and artists, with a focus on data flow and UI interactions.

projects.name: The Royal Swedes
projects.description: A redesigned website for a cover band featuring a review submission form, a video loop background, and a CSS-animated spinning crown logo to create an engaging and dynamic user experience.

projects.name: Project A11y
projects.description: An accessibility-focused web project showcasing the harpejji, featuring semantic HTML, ARIA roles, and keyboard navigation to ensure an inclusive user experience, including those with visual impairments.
